_header: Ye that stand in wealth and great pleasaunce
Subjects: Fortune, fickleness of; mutability; transitoriness, of world
_description: On the mutability of worldly fortune — one stanza rhyme royal

BLAdd60577.First Lines:
Ye þat stonde in welthe and grete plesauncehaue mynde on me
                    þat was some tyme in ease…
BLAdd60577.Last Lines:
…þat he myght stonde in verray sykernesseNeuer to feele
                    þe stroke of vnkyndnes
BLAdd60577.Attributed Title:
Vide de tribulacione in libro scintillarum 50o capitulum
                    (f. 91v)
